setup_enable_moderation: Would ye like t' enable th' moderation part o' th' bot fer yer server?
setup_enable: I shall enable that fer ye.
setup_not_enable: Okay, I shall **nah** enable th' moderation part.
setup_mod_log_question: Would ye like me t' log moderator actions t' a channel?
setup_where_to_log: Okay. Where would ye like me t' log it t'?
setup_channel_not_found: Hmmm. A cannae find that channel.. Are ye sure I 'ave access t' it?
setup_mod_log_channel_success: Okay! I shall log moderator actions t' <#{channel_id}>.
setup_enable_message_logs: Would ye like me t' log scuttled & edited messages t' a channel?
setup_message_log_channel_success: Okay! I shall log moderator actions t' <#{channel_id}>.
setup_custom_prefix: Would ye like t' 'ave a custom prefix?
setup_custom_prefix_yes: Okay. Which one would ye like?
setup_finished: 'n that's it! Ye're good t' go!
invalid_sub_command: Hmmm. I don't know that command, are you sure you typed it out right?
leveling_role_already_assigned: That role already appears to be assigned to an xp level.
leveling_role_assign_success: Okay! Role **{role}** will unlock when you reach {xp} xp. :)
leveling_dm_on: Okay, the `{prefix}rank` command will now **DM** the user.
leveling_dm_off: Okay, the `{prefix}rank` command will now **send the message in the server**.
permissions_role_unknown_permission: Oh no! I don't think I know that permission. Do `{prefix}permissions list` for a list of all available permissions.
